Class ProcessPool

java.lang.Object
it.disi.unitn.json.processpool.ProcessPool
public class ProcessPool extends Object
This class is used to create a thread pool which will be used to execute a specified number of threads.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ProcessPool(@NotNull File model, @NotNull String imageExtension, @NotNull String pathToImagesFolder, int width, int height)
    This constructor creates a new thread pool which will be used to execute a specified number of threads.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    doWait()
    This method waits until all tasks have terminated correctly.
    void
    execute(@NotNull com.google.gson.JsonArray array, @NotNull JSONToImage jti, long timeout)
    This method executes a process from a ProcessBuilder instance and keeps track of a callback to be executed at the process's termination.
    void
    removeHandler(ExecutorResHandler handler)
    This method removes ExecutorResHandler instances from the list of currently active instances.

    This method sets the description to be used when producing the final pictures.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProcessPool

      public ProcessPool(@NotNull @NotNull File model, @NotNull @NotNull String imageExtension, @NotNull @NotNull String pathToImagesFolder, int width, int height) throws InvalidArgumentException
      This constructor creates a new thread pool which will be used to execute a specified number of threads.
      Parameters:
      model - The File instance from which to create the process pool
      imageExtension - The picture's extension
      pathToImagesFolder - The path to the pictures' folder
      width - The pictures' width
      height - The pictures' height
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If any of the arguments given to this constructor is null or less than or equal to zero

  • Method Details

    • setDesc

      public void setDesc(@NotNull @NotNull String newdesc) throws InvalidArgumentException
      This method sets the description to be used when producing the final pictures.
      Parameters:
      newdesc - The description to be used
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the argument given to this method is null or an empty string

    • setIndex

      public void setIndex(int newindex)
      This method sets the index to be used when producing the final pictures.
      Parameters:
      newindex - The index to be used

    • doWait

      public void doWait() throws InterruptedException
      This method waits until all tasks have terminated correctly.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if any thread interrupted the current thread before or while the current thread was waiting. The interrupted status of the current thread is cleared when this exception is thrown.

    • removeHandler

      public void removeHandler(ExecutorResHandler handler)
      This method removes ExecutorResHandler instances from the list of currently active instances.
      Parameters:
      handler - The ExecutorResHandler instance to be used

    • execute

      public void execute(@NotNull @NotNull com.google.gson.JsonArray array, @NotNull @NotNull JSONToImage jti, long timeout) throws InvalidArgumentException
      This method executes a process from a ProcessBuilder instance and keeps track of a callback to be executed at the process's termination.
      Parameters:
      array - The JsonArray instance from which to take the necessary information about the final pictures
      jti - The JSONToImage instance to be used
      timeout - The timeout in milliseconds
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - if any of the arguments to this method is null
